availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred R. Gaunt (Clerk, Carroll Cir. Ct)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer and court clerk. Kentucky native. Married Narcissa Gaunt. Father of John F. Gaunt and James M. Gaunt. Farmer in Carroll County in 1850 and 1860. Owned three enslaved people in Carroll County in 1850. Owned two enslaved people in Carroll County in 1860. Clerk of the Carroll Circuit Court in 1862.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. First, p. 159; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. 1; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. 2, p. 29; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. 2, p. 2; Find A Grave, Alfred R Gaunt (1815 - 1885)," Memorial #31545418, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=31545418 (accessed October 4, 2017); KYR-0001-004-0032.
